qas.question: What makes the classification of the mountains and subregions difficult?
Who came up with the general classification?
Where is the divide between the Eastern Alps and Western Alps near?

context: <a0_0>The variances in nomenclature<a0_0/> in the region spanned by the Alps makes classification of the mountains and subregions difficult, but a general classification is that of the Eastern Alps and Western Alps with the divide between the two occurring in eastern Switzerland according to <a1_0>geologist Stefan Schmid<a1_0/>, near the <a2_0>Splügen Pass<a2_0/>.
